feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: Mrs. Bennet wondered at their coming, and thought them very wrong to give so much trouble.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: Mrs. Bennet's eyes sparkled. 'A gentleman and a stranger! It is Mr. Bingley, I am sure. Why, Jane--you never dropped a word of this--you sly thing! Well, I am sure I shall be extremely glad to see Mr. Bingley.'

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: Mrs. Bennet's eyes sparkled. 'A gentleman and a stranger! It is Mr. Bingley, I am sure. Why, Jane--you never dropped a word of this--you sly thing! Well, I am sure I shall be extremely glad to see Mr. Bingley.'

feels.name: Anticipation
feels.quote: “I hope, my dear,” said Mr. Bennet to his wife, as they were at breakfast the next morning, “that you have ordered a good dinner to-day, because I have reason to expect an addition to our family party.”

feels.name: Admiration
feels.quote: Mr. Collins was punctual to his time, and was received with great politeness by the whole family. Mr. Bennet indeed said little; but the ladies were ready enough to talk, and Mr. Collins seemed neither in need of encouragement, nor inclined to be silent himself.

feels.name: Interest
feels.quote: Elizabeth related to Jane, the next day, what had passed between Mr. Wickham and herself. Jane listened with astonishment and concern: she knew not how to believe that Mr. Darcy could be so unworthy of Mr. Bingley’s regard; and yet it was not in her nature to question the veracity of a young man of such amiable appearance as Wickham.

causedByEvent.name: Conversation between Elizabeth and Jane about Mr. Wickham

feels.quote: Jane listened with astonishment and concern: she knew not how to believe that Mr. Darcy could be so unworthy of Mr. Bingley’s regard; and yet it was not in her nature to question the veracity of a young man of such amiable appearance as Wickham.

causedByEvent.name: Conversation between Elizabeth and Jane about Mr. Wickham

feels.name: Interest
feels.quote: “It is difficult, indeed--it is distressing. One does not know what to think.”

causedByEvent.name: Conversation with Elizabeth about Mr. Darcy
